---
title: "Custom Indicators"
---

## VWAP

$$
\text{VWAP} = \frac{\sum (\text{Price} \times \text{Volume})}{\sum \text{Volume}}
$$


- Long if price > VWAP → bullish trend
- Short if price < VWAP → bearish trend

## Bollinger Bands

- Band width measures volatility
- Buy when price breaks above upper band
- Sell when price breaks below lower band
- Can combine with RSI

## RSI (Relative Strength Index)

- RSI > 50: Bullish, buy signal
- RSI < 50: Bearish, sell signal
- Filters weak momentum

## Parabolic SAR

- Confirms trend direction
- Defines exit points
- Reduces false signals with trailing stops

## CMF (Chaikin Money Flow)

- CMF > 0 → buy pressure
- CMF < 0 → sell pressure
- Combines with VWAP and RSI for confirmation
